text:
@WhiteHouse @POTUS He fu¢ked up that and is still can't figure out what to do. He's a moron.

TRUMP...
Duh, I'm trashing the coronavirus task force because they don't like me talking.
Duh, changing my mind. I can't blame them if they are not here...
Duh, I'm so stupid. What do the poll numbers say?
